idea:
Vishal Digital is an innovative AVIT Solution provider  that helps organization to transform digitally.  Our services are primarily for the  Media, Education, Hospitals and Govt. sectors with solutions spans in to

 

1)      Lecture Capturing and Streaming

2)      Virtual Collaborative Classrooms

3)      Digital Libraries & Media Asset Management

4)      Audio, Video  and IT Systems Integration

 

We assist Organizations to stream line their digital media assets for storage, live streaming , archival and retrieval apart from enabling them with edit facilities.
